Package com.jounaidr.jrc.server.peers.peer

Class PeerClient

java.lang.Object
com.jounaidr.jrc.server.peers.peer.PeerClient
public class PeerClient
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    PeerClient​(java.lang.String peerSocket)
    Instantiates a new Peer client for a given peerSocket, and initialises the get endpoint requests for said peerSocket.

  • Constructor Details

    • PeerClient

      public PeerClient​(java.lang.String peerSocket)
      Instantiates a new Peer client for a given peerSocket, and initialises the get endpoint requests for said peerSocket. The peer client is used to interface with the peer, and a new peer client is instantiated per thread, so thread safety is not necessary...
      Parameters:
      peerSocket - the socket for which the peer client will be initialised for

  • Method Details

    • getPeerBlockchain

      public java.util.ArrayList<Block> getPeerBlockchain() throws java.io.IOException, org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException
      Gets the peers blockchain. Each json object returned from the peers blockchain is converted into a Block object using ...peer.util.JsonBlockUtil
      Returns:
      the peers blockchain
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - connection exceptions
      org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException - json conversion exceptions

    • getPeerBlockchainSize

      public int getPeerBlockchainSize() throws java.io.IOException
      Gets the peers blockchain size.
      Returns:
      the peers blockchain size
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - connection exceptions

    • getPeerLastBlock

      public Block getPeerLastBlock() throws java.io.IOException, org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException
      Gets the peers blockchains last block. The json object returned is converted into a Block object using ...peer.util.JsonBlockUtil
      Returns:
      the peers blockchains last block
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - connection exceptions
      org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException - json conversion exceptions

    • getPeerHealth

      public java.lang.String getPeerHealth() throws java.io.IOException, org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException
      Gets the peers health status.
      Returns:
      the peers health status
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - connection exceptions
      org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException - json conversion exceptions

    • addBlockToPeer

      public java.lang.String addBlockToPeer​(Block block) throws org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException, java.io.IOException
      Submits the provided Block object to the peer. The block object parameter supplied is converted into json format using ...peer.util.JsonBlockUtil
      Parameters:
      block - the block to be submitted
      Returns:
      the return message, will return a success or error message
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - connection exceptions
      org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException - json conversion exceptions

    • getHealthySocketsList

      public java.lang.String getHealthySocketsList() throws java.io.IOException, org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException
      Gets the peers socket list and builds a comma separated string containing only peers with health status UP
      Returns:
      the healthy sockets list
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - connection exceptions
      org.springframework.boot.configurationprocessor.json.JSONException - json conversion exceptions
